page.title: 12CHILDREN'S HOPES FOR FUTURE
page.content: IN THE FUTURE I WOULD LIKE TO SEE MORE JOBS.THE JOB SITUATION IS BAD. I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO WHEN I LEAVE SCHOOL.PERHAPS JOURNALISM. I HOPE THERE WILL BE LESS VIOLENCE IN THE WORLD. PEOPLE HAVE BEEN KILLED AT FOOTBALL MATCHES BY OTHER PEOPLE GETTING OUT OF CONTROL. PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY IN ETHIOPIA ARE STARVING BECAUSE OF DROUGHT. THE REST OF THE WORLD HAS BEEN RAISING MILLIONS OF POUNDS FOR THEM BUT IT STILL IS NOT ENOUGH. IT WOULD BE A BETTER WORLD WITH PLENTY OF FOOD. WAR IS HORRIBLE SO ALL THE COUNTRIES SHOULD AGREE ON NUCLEAR DISARMAMENT AND TROUBLE WITH GROUPS LIKE THE IRA SHOULD BE SOLVED.MORE PEACE WOULD BE NICE. I HOPE THERE WILL BE A CURE FOR CANCER, A HORRIBLE DISEASE.YOU CAN DIE FROM ALL SORTS OF CANCER AFFECTING YOU
